name: Memento of Spring
description: Spring has come, and yet Juliane is more than happy to let it pass from the comforts of her bedroom. But how will her indoor nature survive when the world decides to boot her as far away as possible?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 1.5Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible card Additional Notes: 1024 x 576 widescreen game
